Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic Food, Service and atmosphere. The food was 10/10, Service was 10/10 and atmosphere 10/10. Honestly I would travel back from Ireland just to eat here. The Staff were so kind. Honestly please come here if you are in Amsterdam you won’t be disappointed.

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: One of the rare places, quality food, quality service, classic charm of meals - made with love. You feel looked after and you feel great after the food.

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: Amazing service from an extremely friendly waiter. Nice food

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: Delicious ! Would definitely go back. Staff was very friendly . Had the lamb it was perfect. Close to bars / coffee shops.

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: Beautiful small cosy place with a very nice owner, perfect for a romantic dinner

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: It was an amazing experience! Great food and an amazing service! I absolutely loved it

Review Text: Amazing place for eating good food in Amsterdam.

Name: Quartier Latin
Review Text: Unpretentious, classic French cuisine at reasonable prices. Excellent service, quaint venue, great food. Recommended.
